findings.title: `convertTokenToSystemAmount(...)` relies on optional ERC-20 `decimals()` function
findings.description: ConvertTokenToSystemAmount did not account for ERC-20 tokens that do not implement the decimals() function, or for tokens with zero decimals.

findings.title: Unit tests did not exhaustively test all code paths.
findings.description: The provided unit tests do not cover all possible code execution paths, leaving potential security vulnerabilities undiscovered.
